meanings.sent1: The sky was the cloudiest I had ever seen, making it impossible to see the sun.
meanings.sent2: Today is the cloudiest day of the week, with thick gray clouds covering the entire sky.
meanings.sent3: The weather forecast said it would be the cloudiest day, but I didn't expect this many clouds!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was cloudiest when she tried to remember what happened during the storm.
meanings.sent5: The mountain peak disappeared into the cloudiest mist, creating a mysterious atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Having a large number of clouds
meanings.sent1: The cloudiest sky I've ever seen was filled with fluffy white clouds.
meanings.sent2: Living in a coastal area means we often have the cloudiest skies due to the sea moisture.
meanings.sent3: The picnic was almost ruined by the cloudiest sky, but we still had a great time.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt like the cloudiest sky, filled with thoughts swirling like storm clouds.
meanings.sent5: The field stretched under the cloudiest sky, creating a beautiful backdrop for the flowers.

meanings.sent1: The glass of water looked cloudiest after sitting out for hours.
meanings.sent2: The instructions were written in the cloudiest language, making it hard to understand.
meanings.sent3: His explanation was the cloudiest I've ever heard, leaving everyone confused.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt cloudiest when trying to make sense of the complex math problem.
meanings.sent5: The lake water appeared the cloudiest after the heavy rain, obscuring the fish below.
